JobFullDesc: Facebook is seeking a highly strategic, quantitative, process and detail-oriented Program Manager to join Facebook’s Business Planning and Operations team. The Business Planning and Operations (BP&O) Program Manager will be supporting a global stakeholder group while also working cross-functionally to solve some of the most complex problems facing the business. The mission of our Business Planning and Operations group is to maximize business performance by being the objective, trusted partner to the sales organization through analytics, strategic planning, cross-functional collaboration and operational excellence. We identify and drive critical projects and strategic initiatives to support revenue growth while supporting the operational cadence to surface business insights. In your role as a Program Manager within the Business Planning and Operations team, you will be a key partner to the business delivering against three core functions: 1) Core operations (e.g. planning, metrics, and rhythm of business), 2) Strategic initiatives to improve efficiency and 3) Organizational enablement through analytics, process improvements and tools. Sample projects include sizing a new business opportunity, driving organizational design conversation, and leading the development of KPIs for the organization.The successful candidate must be able to roll-up his/her sleeves. He/she will be passionate about their work, detail-oriented, analytical, and have excellent problem-solving abilities. He/she will drive towards simple, scalable solutions to difficult problems, have excellent project-management skills, and be able to communicate complex analytical results in a clear and easy-to-understand way.
